title: 2 Euro - Benedictus XVI (80th Birthday)

composition.text: Bimetallic: nickel brass clad nickel centre in copper-nickel ring

obverse.description: The inner part of the coin features the profile of His Holiness Benedict XVI facing the left. The legend ‘BENEDICTI XVI P.M. AETATIS ANNO LXXX CITTA' DEL VATICANO’ is engraved along the outer edge of the inner part of the coin. To the left of the effigy are the mintmark, ‘R’, the year of issue, ‘2007’, and the initials of the engraver, ‘M.C.C. INC.’, while the artist’s name, ‘LONGO’, is inscribed on the right. The outer ring of the coin bears the 12 stars of the European Union.
obverse.lettering:
BENEDICT XVI P.M AETATIS ANNO LXXX CITTA DEL VATICANO 
R
2007
M.C.C INC
LONGO
obverse.lettering_translation:
His Holiness Pope Benedict XVI 80th birthday City State of Vatican
R

reverse.description: A map, next to the face value, shows the European continent without borders.

commemorated_topic: 80th birthday of His Holiness Pope Benedict XVI

edge.description: Finely ribbed with edge lettering: six times the sequence "2 * " alternately upright and inverted

mints.name: Istituto Poligrafico e Zecca dello Stato
